About Me

BIO

I am a software engineer who is mostly experienced in front-end development, building websites and web applications. At first, I enjoyed creating small applications for personnal use and that motivated to acquire more understanding of the web from beginning to end. I have solid knowledge in Javascript, HTML, and CSS as well as in the library for building fast, reusable, interactive user interfaces React. I am also familiar with NodeJS, Express, MongoDB and most important of all APIs.
